Reviews.Title: “Not fit for purpose”
Reviews.Author: BrainsFife
Reviews.Content: arrived party school trip told couldnt accommodate building person desk surprised told found totally unacceptable bit opinion total 55 hotel gather told breakfast angrily refused consider eventually persuaded extra beds ensure roof wall wall beds floor space themselves poor quality mine stank sewage smell coming drain shower placed plastic cup plug hole weighed shoe seal smell disappeared hour window day maid moved cup smell walls corridor nails sticking tore shirt insisted company alternative accommodation day definitely suitable

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel good location”
Reviews.Author: bbindal
Reviews.Content: impression entering hotel advertised website lobby grim reception clean hotel located short walk termini station breakfast ok staff welcoming dont expect assistance overall money paid couldve gotten location worth 60 euros 85 paid hotels value visit rome probably choose hotel

Reviews.Title: “Handy to Central Termini”
Reviews.Author: RetireeBob
Reviews.Content: dei mille 5 min walk central termini safe selection restaraunts nearby smallish clean comfortable hot window double glazed street noise leave window night wear ear plugs dont air conditioning june breakfast cellar recently updated layout real maze wifi zone ground floor fee charged staff friendly helpful
